name: owkin
description: Interact with AI agents built for biology. Owkin build AI agents for biology to accelerate drug discovery and de-risk clinical trials. The Owkin connector currently powers HistoPLUS, an agent that transforms H&E slides from the TCGA database into granular, queryable insights. Researchers can use it to quantify distinct cell types, analyze complex spatial tumor microenvironments, and validate hypotheses through cohort-level survival analysis.
